title: Can you fix your Punishment system Riot?!
body:
Not only me but many players when we go ranked, There will be this one certain person who's got the role of adc but will insta lock Yasuo top. Why do we lose LP for dodging from trolls?! That's not fair. Like this is the world's biggest online game, It sucks badly.If players like that certain person are gonna proceed to troll and never really get punished yet we get punished for dodging and Lose LP because of someone trolling?

I think you can do much better than this Riot.

replies.body: or maybe he's playing yas adc... it's not like everyone has to be a meta slave... and it's also not like someone like "imaqtpie" didn't get to challenger from diamond playing only yasuo adc.
What are the odds of getting imaqtpie in my ranked game who can go adc anything and still do better than everyone?
doesn't have to be qtpie, it's the fact he played yasuo alot till he got good at yasuo and climbed, did the same thing with gp.

First, there is no ADC role in champ select, only BOT. So until u are  ingame u dont know where he will go. How are they supposed to punish someone if they dont know if he really doesnt go to his assigned role.  Noone is forcing u to dodge, its your fault. You didnt lose LP cause of "someone trolling" but cause u choose to dodge game.
First Bot = ADC role. Its common sense, It's called BOT cause, This is a MOBA.

Bot is a position. Not a role.

Just like how many people think mid = mage, many people think Bot = adc, thus bot = adc becomes meta



One of the definitions of Off meta = playing non-adc bot lane
